channel.title: How do i upload my client to uppit or anything like that
channel.description:
i cant upload more than one file at a time and i dont know what file i HAVE to upload. If anyone can help me with this then i will be very thankful
-Thanks d man103456

item.title: How do i upload my client to uppit or anything like that
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Uploading clients to those kinds of site (megaupload,upit,etc) won’t enable the client to work because you cannot get a direct link.

EDIT: Wait, your not talking about the JAR… you can just use the Windows default(ZIP) or Winrar as MP said.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i upload my client to uppit or anything like that

item.title: How do i upload my client to uppit or anything like that
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

You mudt hsve winrar, Compress it (add to archive) then upload the file you get out of compressing it.
